author: Azureus

text: Honestly, while The Moon gets all the credit, I think this is right up there with it. In some ways, I actually think it more suits a video game in its playfulness. Love both of them, though... Duck Tales music is a force to be reckoned with, from the video game to the cartoons. Who couldn't finish the lyrics if I said "Life is like a hurricane?"
author: Ryeguy123a

text: As much as I love Epic Mickey, Duck Tales is still the #1 Disney video game of all time for me.

author: Fransinn3

text:
Duck Tales was one of my favorite games as a kid. The solid gameplay, great music, varied environments and enemies give it incredible replayability.

Though it's a bit old I do think any gamer could get a lot of satisfaction out of the game.  To pfifofast and others who have had some trouble I'd give just three tips:

-The pogojump is your best friend in game, go anywhere but down a freefall pit with it.
-The game has more hidden areas than you'd think.
-Try, try again

This track is awesome
